overview:
Laurent Renard is currently the CEO of Toro Ltd.

Before co-founding TORO, Laurent has been working in the Smart Card industry in Asia-Pacific for 3 years at FIME (Orange Business Services). Before that, he was working for innovation consultancy firm NODE in Spain and France.

Laurent holds degrees from Ecole Centrale Paris (ECP), and from the Business School of the University of Strasburg (IECS), France.
